title: Riot why punish me for something i have no control over?
body:
couple of hours ago my internet went down us i was loading a ranked game and i didn't played the game  because my ISP went down 

Now am asking you 

How on earth could i have known that my internet would go down and cost the game to go on a remake ?

and on top of that you punish me without even knowing the reason of the problem 

thanks again Riot you are really thoughtful of everything

http://i.imgur.com/92uui3m.png

replies.body:
We understand that sometimes stuff can just go wrong, which is why you'll never land in a low priority queue for a single disconnection. It takes a trend of disconnections before you'll land in a 5-game low priority queue. 

Because disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match, regardless of intent, the system treats all disconnections equally. This is a prime reason why penalties cannot be modified or removed in any way. For complete details on the Leaverbuster System, check out [our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
